ISSUE.TITLE: pivot_root: Invalid argument during build
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Podman does not pass `--no-pivot` to crun regardless of whether the `no_pivot_root` variable in containers.conf has a value of true or false. In result build cannot be finished. ```shell [16:42][selkie@buildroot][~/composetest] $ uname -a Linux buildroot 5.10.226 #1 SMP PREEMPT Tue Nov 12 11:23:56 CET 2024 armv7l GNU/Linux ``` ```shell [16:32][selkie@buildroot][~/composetest] $ podman --log-level debug build . INFO[0000] podman filtering at log level debug DEBU[0000] Called build.PersistentPreRunE(podman --log-level debug build .)
